info.title: UQ Final API
info.description:
Get information about assessment items at the University of Queensland.

**Note:** all success responses defined in these docs are wrapped into the data property of a JSend standard success wrapper https://labs.omniti.com/labs/jsend

get.description: The Semesters endpoint returns information about all known semesters

The offering endpoint returns details about a course in a semester.
Will attempt to scrape the information if not cached locally, but will give a vague error message on failure.

parameters.name: uqSemesterId
parameters.description: The UQ Semester Code to find assessment details in

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: The UQ Course Code to find assessment details for

get.description:
Will scrape data on a course only if the semester is valid and there isn't already data cached.
There is no way to force a rescrape of a course, invalid data must be fixed manually.
This route provides more detailed errors of scraping failure than the autoscrape built into the offering route does.

parameters.name: uqSemesterId
parameters.description: The UQ Semester Code to find assessment details in

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: The UQ Course Code to find assessment details for

shortName.description: A shortened name of a semester.

uqId.description: The UQ ID for a semester.

courseCode.description: UQ provided 8 character course code. Note some courses have more than 8 characters.

id.description: ID of the assessment item internal to UQ Final

taskName.description: The title of the assessment item as obtained from UQ

weight.description:
The weight of the assessment item as obtained from UQ.
In the perfect case, this is an integer. Other cases include "Pass/Fail" or arbitrary strings as written by the course coordinator

isLinear.description:
Whether a course's grading system is linear.
This value may be innacurate, it is true by default and can be manually set to false if it's discovered that the course doesn't have a linear grading system.

manuallyModified.description:
Whether this offering's details have been manually modified by a human.
True should warn the user that the data may no longer reflect the course profile.

calculable.description: Whether this offering's grades are calculable server side.

1.description: Minimum total percentage required to get a course grade of 1

2.description: Minimum total percentage required to get a course grade of 2

3.description: Minimum total percentage required to get a course grade of 3

4.description: Minimum total percentage required to get a course grade of 4

5.description: Minimum total percentage required to get a course grade of 5

6.description: Minimum total percentage required to get a course grade of 6

7.description: Minimum total percentage required to get a course grade of 7
